snippet: New Jersey’s Division of Gaming Enforcement said on Monday that its casinos could create their own fantasy sports games or partner with online companies, starting April 22.
abstract: New Jersey’s Division of Gaming Enforcement announces that its casinos will be allowed to create their own fantasy sports games or partner with online companies; decision comes as plan to legalize sports gambling remains held up in courts.
lead_paragraph: New Jersey’s Division of Gaming Enforcement said on Monday that its casinos could create their own fantasy sports games or partner with online companies, starting April 22.

headline.seo: Atlantic City Casinos to Offer Fantasy Sports Betting
headline.main: New Jersey to Allow Casinos to Offer Daily Fantasy Sports
headline.print_headline: New Jersey to Allow Casinos to Offer Daily Fantasy Sports
